医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
家族罕见的端粒突变揭示了端粒灵活性和疾病的新见解研究人员在一个家族中发现了一种罕见的端粒突变（TTAGGT），表明人类端粒可以容忍非规范序列，从而影响端粒维持和疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Familys-rare-telomere-mutation-reveals-new-insights-into-telomere-flexibility-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Familys-rare-telomere-mutation-reveals-new-insights-into-telomere-flexibility-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48339554-2efc-4051-9989-35dbcf6cd199 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 00:08:00 -0400 Family's rare telomere mutation reveals new insights into telomere flexibility and disease
超加工食品会改变肠道微生物组吗？ 《营养》杂志上的一篇评论强调了超加工食品对肠道微生物组的负面影响以及在研究中使用 NOVA 食品分类系统的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Do-ultra-processed-foods-alter-the-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Do-ultra-processed-foods-alter-the-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=954fd843-087d-4286-8277-b37ba7bdf2c8 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 23:47:00 -0400 Do ultra-processed foods alter the gut microbiome?
研究发现，Facebook 上未标记的疫苗怀疑内容导致人们对疫苗产生严重犹豫《科学》杂志最近的一项研究表明，Facebook 上未标记的疫苗怀疑内容会显着降低 COVID-19 疫苗接种意愿。这凸显了迫切需要更好的错误信息干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Unflaagged-vaccine-skeptical-content-on-Facebook-causes-significant-vaccine-hesitancy-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Unflaagged-vaccine-skeptical-content-on-Facebook-causes-significant-vaccine-hesitancy-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45ed1297-8b60-4e13-8fd0-6efefe6b6e78 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 23:32:00 -0400 Unflagged vaccine-skeptical content on Facebook causes significant vaccine hesitancy, study finds
来自长期新冠患者的 IgG 在小鼠中诱发特定症状，证实了自身免疫的作用研究人员发现，长期感染新冠病毒患者的 IgG 会在小鼠体内诱发特定症状，这表明 IgG 在长期感染新冠病毒的发病机制中发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/IgG-from-long-COVID-病人-induces-specific-symptoms-in-mice-confirming-autoimmunitys-role.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/IgG-from-long-COVID-病人-induces-specific-symptoms-in-mice-confirming-autoimmunitys-role.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f4a5c69-529a-44c5-b2d0-a1d9d00ce4d3 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 23:03:00 -0400 IgG from long COVID patients induces specific symptoms in mice, confirming autoimmunity's role
吃辣椒会降低还是增加肥胖风险？ 《营养前沿》的研究人员调查了吃辣椒是否会降低或增加美国成年人肥胖的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Does-eating-chili-pepper-decrease-or-increase-obesity-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Does-eating-chili-pepper-decrease-or-increase-obesity-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c69d170a-4726-49a5-a186-9499d08c4dc2 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 21:52:00 -0400 Does eating chili pepper decrease or increase obesity risk?
将人类价值观融入医疗人工智能：道德与效率的平衡《新英格兰医学杂志》的研究人员回顾了将人类价值观融入基于人工智能的大语言模型如何影响医学临床决策。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Integrating- human-values-into-medical-AI-Balancing-ethics-and-efficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Integrating- human-values-into-medical-AI-Balancing-ethics-and-efficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1e08d86-5492-49a9-8a16-5628625c3374 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 21:40:00 -0400 Integrating human values into medical AI: Balancing ethics and efficiency
即使没有 CAD，冠状动脉炎症也与高心脏事件风险相关《柳叶刀》的研究人员强调了冠状动脉炎症在增加主要不良心脏事件和心血管死亡方面的作用，无论是否存在冠状动脉疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Coronary-arterial-inflammation-linked-to-high-cardiac-event-risk-even-without-CAD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Coronary-arterial-inflammation-linked-to-high-cardiac-event-risk-even-without-CAD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0897fc9c-ffe0-49d9-a82c-0a901a14d1b4 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 21:22:00 -0400 Coronary arterial inflammation linked to high cardiac event risk even without CAD
内分泌学会发布关于维生素 D 使用和测试的新临床实践指南根据今天发布的新的临床实践指南，75 岁以下的健康成年人不太可能从超过医学研究所 (IOM) 建议的每日维生素 D 摄入量中获益，并且不需要检测维生素 D 水平。内分泌学会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Endocrine-Society-issues-new-clinical-practice-guideline-on-vitamin-D-use-and-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Endocrine-Society-issues-new-clinical-practice-guideline-on-vitamin-D-use-and-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aed9cd46-842a-414c-a76a-a41430794f41 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 15:37:09 -0400 Endocrine Society issues new clinical practice guideline on vitamin D use and testing
孕前减肥手术类型可能会影响孩子的早期体重增加周一在马萨诸塞州波士顿举行的内分泌学会年会 ENDO 2024 上发表的一项研究表明，女性在怀孕前接受的减肥手术类型可能会影响她们的孩子在生命前三年的体重增加量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Pre-pregnancy-weight-loss-surgery-type-may-affect-childs-early-weight-gain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Pre-pregnancy-weight-loss-surgery-type-may-affect-childs-early-weight-gain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1075690d-a0c5-4a63-9e5a-ace11aabc1e4 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 15:33:17 -0400 Pre-pregnancy weight loss surgery type may affect child's early weight gain
远程医疗促进糖尿病和心脏病患者公平地获得内分泌护理周一在马萨诸塞州波士顿举行的内分泌学会年会 ENDO 2024 上公布的一项研究显示，大流行期间远程医疗的广泛普及使 2 型糖尿病和心脏病患者能够更公平地获得内分泌护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Telemedicine-boosts-equitable-access-to-endocrinology-care-for-病人-with-diabetes-and-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Telemedicine-boosts-equitable-access-to-endocrinology-care-for-病人-with-diabetes-and-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74c5662e-6988-4bcb-9d3e-4f5a6075ba97 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 15:28:27 -0400 Telemedicine boosts equitable access to endocrinology care for patients with diabetes and heart disease
